b'So why is Leerink angry with $MLND ? Why the downgrade ? Makes no sense when they\xe2\x80\x99re hired as an advisor. Did the management not like their proposed deal ? It\xe2\x80\x99ll be interesting to see what happens here . Am I selling ? F**k no'
